overview: If you thought the title Too Many Boys sounded a bit ridiculous—as though there were such a thing as too many boys—then you’ll be equally amused by Bel Ami’s sequel, 2 Too Many Boys, in which eighteen handsome young men vie for out-of-the-way nooks and crannies for private trysts. As in the original, Johan Paulik introduces us to the premise of what’s happening, but this time he teases us by floating around a pool wearing nothing but a smile as Sebastian Bonnet lights his cigar and serves him champagne
title: Too Many Boys 2
